Privacy Policy

• No data about you or your device is gathered, stored, collected or saved
• We do not display or offer any Ads

How to use this App

• Select which components you want to enable and press \"Start\"
• A Menu will appear in your notification bar where you can stop the Drain service
• You can now minimize or even close this app and use other apps while the draining continues, as long as the Notification menu is still there
• If you choose CPU/GPU load, your device will be more sluggish while draining
• At any point of time, you can stop draining by either pressing \"Stop\" in either the Main Page or in the Notification Menu
• Also, if you previously closed the app after starting the drain, you can open it again by clicking on the Notification Menu
• WARNING: Running this app for a prolonged period can cause the battery to heat up. Do not allow your battery to get too hot. You can set a cutoff temperature in the settings menu.

Permissions

• Certain permissions are required to run some functions.
• If you do not feel comfortable with granting a permission, you can still use the other functions normally

Functions

• Flash: Turns on the Torch/LED flash
• Screen/Wake Lock: Keeps the screen from turning off and stays at Max Brightness
• CPU load: Performs continuous Integer & Floating Point & Double Precision calculations to put load on the CPU
• GPU load: Performs Parallel Floating Point multiplication on the GPU. This will also put load on the CPU
• GPS: Continuously requests GPS location to drain the battery. The location data is not used or saved.
• Wifi: Continuously performs WiFi scans. The scan results are not used or saved.
• Bluetooth: Cont inuously performs Bluetooth scans. The scan results are not used or saved.

Settings

• For safety reasons, the application will automatically stop upon reaching a certain battery temperature or level limit.
• You can choose the value for those limits by clicking the gear icon in the top right of the tool bar.
• You can also set your temperature units(C/F) here if you\'re from one of the 5 countries in the entire world that doesn\'t use Celsius
Does calculations on GPU (May load CPU)
The Camera Permission is needed in order to turn on the flashlight.\n- You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to turn on the flashlight.

- The Modify Settings Permission is needed in order to modify system brightness.
- You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to change the screen brightness.
- To grant the permission, click OK and select Generic Battery Drainer, then toggle the permission switch.
- Would you like to grant this permission?

- The Access Fine Location Permission is needed in order to make GPS requests.
- Your location data is not used, collected, saved or shared.
- It is only invoked to make GPS requests to drain the battery.
- You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to drain the battery via making GPS requests.
- Would you like to grant this permission?

- Wifi needs to be on to perform repeated Wifi scans.
- Your wifi scan results are not used, collected, saved or shared.
- You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to drain the battery via making Wifi scans.
- Would you like to turn Wifi on?

- Bluetooth needs to be enabled to perform Bluetooth Scans.
- Your Bluetooth scan results are not used, collected, saved or shared.
- You can still use this app without granting this permission,but you will not be able to drain the battery via making Bluetooth scans.
- Would you like to turn Bluetooth on?
